channel.title: Delta Config Help!
channel.description:
Okay, so I'm editing my drops and when I add this code: [code]npcdrop = 50 298 1 6[/code]
I get this in my cmd when I run my server: [code]Swebbyscape is online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2036) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:545) at server.main(server.java:111) [/code]
Please help! :s

item.title: Delta Config Help!
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“mista pnut, post:14, topic:408756”]I finally figured out the error!! If anyone else gets this error, it’s because the NPC you are trying to add the drop to already has the maximum number of drops! 15 is the max for delta it looks like because I cannot have more than 15 drops per NPC.

Thanks to anyone that tried to help![/quote]

I fucking said that in my first post. Did you even bother to read it?

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Config Help!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I finally figured out the error!! If anyone else gets this error, it’s because the NPC you are trying to add the drop to already has the maximum number of drops! 15 is the max for delta it looks like because I cannot have more than 15 drops per NPC.

Thanks to anyone that tried to help!

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Config Help!
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Something is wrong with your syntax, look over it, you’ll find the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Config Help!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

But, I just copied and paste the code and just changed the npc’s ID and drop percentage and I already have some of the drops on other npc’s and it’s working fine. It’s just when I add any more it messes up.

Read full topic

You used spaces instead of tabs somewhere.

item.title: Delta Config Help!
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Make sure there isn’t an extra tab after the 6.

You may have too many drops for the NPC so you may have to delete a drop.

Read full topic
